parameters.name: BatchInterval
parameters.description: The cooldown interval between two batches.

parameters.name: BatchSize
parameters.description: The number of nodes to be removed in a single batch.

parameters.name: DecreaseNodeCount
parameters.description: The number of nodes to scale out. The number of nodes to be scaled out. The value should be less than the number of surviving nodes in the current node group.

parameters.name: NodeGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the node group.

parameters.name: NodeIds
parameters.description: The array of node IDs. Valid values of array element N: 1 to 500.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to create the instance.
